scripts.build-exe-linux: bun run build-fe && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile bin/x64/linux/psi ./src/index.ts
scripts.build-exe-win: bun run build-fe-win && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile bin/x64/win/psi.exe ./src/index.ts
scripts.build-exe-mac: bun run build-fe && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile bin/x64/mac/psi ./src/index.ts
scripts.build-fe-win: cd ../../frontend && bun run build && tar acvf pfe.zip dist && mv pfe.zip ..\apps\cli\pfe.zip
scripts.build-fe: cd ../../frontend && bun run build && tar acvf pfe.zip dist && mv pfe.zip ../apps/cli/pfe.zip
